import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function (props) { const [authMode, setAuthMode] = useState("signin"); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: "", username: "", password: "" }) const changeAuthMode = () => { setAuthMode(authMode === "signin" ? "signup" : "signin"); }; function signIn(e) { e.preventDefault() const fd = new FormData() fd.append('Full Name', formData.fullName) fd.append('Username', formData.username) fd.append('Password', formData.password) const req = new Request({ url: '/auth', method: 'POST', body: fd }) fetch(req) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } function Register(e) { e.preventDefault() console.log(e.target[1].value) } function handle(e) { const newData = {...formData} newData[e.target.id] = e.target.value setFormData(newData) } if (authMode === "signin") { return (
signIn(e)}>

handle(e)} id="password" type="password" className="form-control mt-1" placeholder="Enter password" />
